**As a** [role]  
 **I need** [function]

 ### Details and Assumptions
 * [document what you know]
   
 ### Acceptance Criteria  
   
 ```gherkin
Given [some context]
When [a specific action is performed]
Then [the outcome of the action is observed] 
 ```
